name: Trogue64
overview: Sometime in the ’80s, a zombie outbreak plagued the local town. A daring group of heroes lured the undead to an abandoned mine. On the 64th level, they blocked the trogue (drain) and flooded the mine. Recently, a depth alarm has gone off — the mine is draining. Someone has popped the Trogue! Start from the lowest part of the mine, activate “8” pumps to flood the ravenous undead before they can escape. Each pump raises the water level, so move fast — or join the ranks of the undead!
